title: 2 crashes in a month: Govt mulls safety ranking of charter operators
content: Following two fatal charter aircraft crashes, India's aviation regulator is introducing a safety ranking for non-scheduled operators. Operators must now disclose critical safety information online, and stricter penalties will be imposed for violations. The DGCA is enforcing a zero-tolerance policy, holding senior leadership accountable for safety lapses.

title: IBM's rout, 'ghost' GDP: Why AI doom loop may be just a 'scary bedtime story'
content: Markets were rattled after a report projected a 2028 worldwide intelligence crisis, claiming AI would decimate professional roles and spark economic freefall, leading to a steep drop in IBM‚Äôs share price. Yet many specialists dispute this doomsday timeline, arguing that AI‚Äôs impact will unfold more gradually, with outcomes depending significantly on how policymakers manage labor, regulation, and innovation.

title: US moves closer to tougher H-1B wage norms as proposal clears federal review
content: The US is moving closer to revising wage rules for foreign workers, with a proposed regulation affecting H-1B visas and employment-based green cards clearing federal review. This development could lead to increased minimum wage requirements for sponsored employees, impacting hiring costs and eligibility for foreign professionals, particularly those from India.

title: Trade, defence & security on agenda as PM Modi heads to Israel
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's two-day visit to Israel, commencing Wednesday, aims to strengthen the strategic partnership and address shared challenges. The agenda includes meetings with Israeli counterpart Benjamin Netanyahu, an address to the Knesset, and discussions on technology, defense, and trade. An upgraded security pact and a potential free trade agreement are key outcomes anticipated from this significant diplomatic engagement.

title: Donald Trump to address Congress joint session amid SCOTUS tariff ruling and Iran tensions
content: President Trump addresses Congress amid significant challenges, including a Supreme Court ruling against his tariffs and rising Iran tensions. He's expected to defend his economic record, touting past successes while facing concerns over inflation and slower growth. The speech, potentially lengthy, aims to rally support ahead of crucial midterm elections, though some Democrats plan to boycott.

title: After IBM's worst day on stock market, IBM VP: AI tools emerge, what they don‚Äôt change is ...
content: IBM faced its worst stock market day in over 25 years. Fears arose that a new AI tool from Anthropic could challenge its core business. IBM defended its mainframe platform, stating its value transcends specific programming languages like COBOL. The company highlighted its own AI investments for code modernization, emphasizing the complexity of enterprise workloads beyond simple code translation.

title: What made judge angry with executives who accompanied Zuckerberg for social media trial
content: Mark Zuckerberg faced a Los Angeles court for a social media addiction trial. The judge sternly warned his associates against using AI-powered smart glasses to record testimony, threatening contempt.  These Meta Ray-Ban glasses, capable of recording, drew scrutiny amid privacy concerns and the ongoing trial against Meta and YouTube.

title: Graft in judiciary, cases backlog in NCERT book
content: Class 8 students will now learn about judicial challenges like corruption, massive case backlogs, and judge shortages. The new NCERT textbook highlights how these issues hinder justice, especially for the poor. It details pending cases across courts and mentions efforts to boost transparency and accountability, including a code of conduct for judges and a grievance system.

title: Su-57 or F-35? Why India may opt for Russia's 5th gen fighter
content: India is reportedly considering the Russian Su-57 as an interim fifth-generation fighter to bridge a capability gap before its indigenous AMCA is ready. Russia has proposed joint production and technology transfer, presenting the Su-57 as a more flexible option than the US F-35 due to its operational restrictions.

title: IBM stock‚Äôs worst single-day drop in 25 yrs over Anthropic tool
content: IBM shares plummeted after AI startup Anthropic announced its tool can automate COBOL modernization, threatening IBM's core mainframe business. This AI advancement could compress years-long, costly migration projects into months, impacting recurring revenue from hardware, software, and services. The market reacted swiftly, signaling a potential shift in the legacy IT services landscape.

title: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight vs Miami Heat injury update report now
content: Giannis Antetokounmpo remains sidelined with a right calf strain, missing another crucial game for the Milwaukee Bucks.  The team, already struggling without their star, faces the Miami Heat with key players needing to step up.  Miami, with fewer injury concerns, holds an advantage, particularly inside, as Milwaukee seeks perimeter scoring to compete.

title: Jharkhand, Odisha judicial officers to be drafted to speed up Bengal SIR
content: The Supreme Court has allowed the Calcutta High Court Chief Justice to enlist judicial officers from Jharkhand and Odisha to expedite the verification of 50 lakh voters in West Bengal facing 'logical discrepancy' or 'unmapped' status. The apex court clarified Aadhaar is solely for identification, not citizenship claims, and supplementary voter lists will be published post-February 28.

title: Proud of 'babbar shers' of Youth Congress: Rahul on AI meet stir
content: Rahul Gandhi praised Indian Youth Congress members arrested for protesting the AI Summit, calling them "babbar shers" who exposed a "compromised PM." The BJP criticized Gandhi, labeling him a "running joke" and accusing him of anarchic conduct and ignorance regarding the US trade agreement.

title: Kayla Nicole hints at past issues with Travis Kelce before wedding
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are just weeks ahead of their lavish wedding which the whole world is waiting for. Amid this, Travis Kelce's ex girlfriend, Kayla Nicole, has made a shocking confession where she has hinted at how the Kansas City Chiefs' star player might have cheated on her during their five year long relationship that ended in 2022.

title: Ellen Weinberg-Hughes responds to Donald Trump's women hockey joke controversy
content: Ellen Hughes defended both Team USA hockey teams after President Donald Trump‚Äôs women‚Äôs hockey joke caused backlash online. Speaking on TODAY, she said the men and women share strong unity and support each other fully. Jack Hughes and Quinn Hughes also praised the women‚Äôs team. The women declined the State of the Union invite, while the men plan to attend.

title: Thunder vs Raptors injury report: Who‚Äôs playing, injured & questionable
content: The Oklahoma City Thunder, leading the Western Conference, face the Toronto Raptors on February 24, 2026. Both teams are hampered by injuries, with OKC missing key starters like Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Jalen Williams. Toronto relies on Scottie Barnes and RJ Barrett as key available options, aiming to leverage their ball movement and rebounding against a strong Thunder defense.

title: Cabinet approval to rename Kerala reflects will of people of state: PM Modi
content: The Union Cabinet has approved renaming Kerala as Keralam, fulfilling a long-standing popular demand. This decision aligns with the state assembly's resolutions and reflects the will of the people. The process will involve the President referring the matter to the state assembly for its views before parliamentary action.

title: 4 dead, 11 injured after speeding bus hits two vehicles on NH-31 in Bihar‚Äôs Bhagalpur
content: A speeding bus collided head-on with two smaller vehicles on National Highway 31 in Bihar's Bhagalpur district, resulting in four fatalities, including a six-year-old boy. Eleven others were injured in the tragic accident, which occurred near Bagri Pul. Authorities are investigating the incident and plan to widen the highway to improve safety.

title: Iran's war calculus: Why Khamenei is betting on Trump for his regime's survival
content: The United States has built up one of its largest Middle East deployments in years, with two aircraft carriers moving into position and additional warships and aircraft arriving in the region. The State Department has also begun thinning out exposed outposts. Meanwhile, Iran is preparing itself for a protracted war with US. It is dispersing authority, hardening infrastructure, rehearsing retaliation, tightening internal security, and signaling that it can raise global costs through Hormuz and regional targeting.

title: Brook dents Pakistan‚Äôs hopes for semis; England cement last-four berth
content: Harry Brook‚Äôs masterful unbeaten century powered England to a decisive win, denting Pakistan‚Äôs semi-final hopes and sealing England‚Äôs place in the last-four. Promoted to number three, the captain absorbed early pressure before dominating the chase. Earlier, Sahibzada Farhan‚Äôs fluent fifty went in vain as Pakistan collapsed late to 164 for 9.

title: Josh Allen‚Äôs wife Hailee Steinfeld breaks silence on daily bullying
content: Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld are prepping for the next chapters of their lives after being married for close to a year. While the high profile couple maintain privacy about their pregnancy, Hailee Steinfeld's heartbreaking confession about being bullied has resurfaced. The BAFTA nominated actress faced heavy bullying in her younger years and was terrified of it as her life went on.

title: PM chairs 1st Cabinet meeting at Seva Teerth, pushes for reforms
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has urged his cabinet colleagues to identify and propose reforms focused on ease of living and ease of doing business. This directive follows the adoption of the 'Seva Sankalp Resolution' at Seva Teerth, emphasizing citizen-centric governance and nation-building. Ministries are expected to detail both ongoing and planned changes, with a particular focus on non-financial regulatory reforms.

title: Dinesh Lal Yadav confesses he never loved his wife in 26 years of 'forced' marriage
content: Bhojpuri superstar Dinesh Lal Yadav, popularly known as Nirahua, has once again grabbed headlines ‚Äî this time for his candid remarks about his personal life. The actor, who has been married to Mansha Devi since 2000 and is a father to two sons, opened up about his marriage and his views on love during a recent interaction, sparking conversations across social media and entertainment circles.

title: Horoscope today: Daily astrological predictions for all zodiac signs
content: Horoscope Today: Read daily horoscope predictions for February 25, 2026. Know all about the astrological events and influences that will be affecting each of the 12 zodiac signs. Our astrologer has analyzed the movements of the planets and the alignment of the stars to bring you the most accurate and up-to-date horoscope predictions for the day ahead. Get ready to discover what the stars have in store for you today.

title: Katrina Kaif makes first public appearance after welcoming baby Vihaan
content: After embracing motherhood, Katrina Kaif has largely stayed away from the public eye. The actor, who welcomed her first child ‚Äî baby boy Vihaan ‚Äî with husband Vicky Kaushal on November 7, 2025, recently made her first appearance since delivery, delighting fans.

title: Sasikala floats new party, unveils its flag which carries images of three late leaders
content: Sasikala made the announcement during a public meeting at Kamuthi in Ramanathapuram district on the birth anniversary of Jayalalithaa.

title: How can Pakistan reach T20 WC semi-final after England defeat?
content: Pakistan‚Äôs semi-final hopes remain alive despite losing to England, who qualified after Harry Brook‚Äôs century chase of 164. Pakistan have one point from two games and must beat Sri Lanka in their final match. They also need New Zealand to lose both games to qualify directly, or else hope to edge them on net run rate. Any other results will eliminate Pakistan from the T20 World Cup.

title: Candace Owens sparks backlash with ‚ÄúBride of Charlie‚Äù series on Erika Kirk
content: Candace Owens has stirred major controversy after releasing the trailer for her YouTube investigative series The Bride of Charlie, centered on Erika Kirk. The preview quickly went viral, prompting backlash, intense online debate, and questions directed at Charlie Kirk‚Äôs allies. While supporters call it accountability journalism, critics warn it risks harassment and speculation, as silence from prominent conservative voices fuels growing tension.

title: Toilet trouble: US troops feel the 'pressure' as Trump vows to flush out Khamenei regime
content: America's most advanced aircraft carrier, the USS Gerald R Ford, is grappling with persistent sewage system failures during its extended deployment near the Middle East. Despite the Navy's assurances of operational readiness, the $13 billion vessel's next-generation plumbing struggles with waste from its 4,600-strong crew, leading to frequent clogs and demanding 19-hour shifts for engineers.

title: PAK vs ENG: Pakistan fan's hilarious reaction after Saim Ayub dismissal goes viral - Watch
content: A Pakistan fan‚Äôs appalled reaction after Saim Ayub was dismissed for 7 by Jofra Archer went viral during the T20 World Cup match against England. Pakistan scored 164/9, with Sahibzada Farhan top-scoring with 63 and Fakhar Zaman adding 25. Liam Dawson took three wickets as England kept pressure with regular breakthroughs, while Babar Azam made a slow 25.

title: Sarma vs Gogoi: How a decade-old Cong rift turned into Assam's fiercest political war
content: Assam's political landscape is heating up as Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma and Congress leader Gaurav Gogoi trade sharp accusations. The ongoing war of words between both the leaders has turned into a major political showdown. What began over a decade ago as a rift within the Congress has now become one of the most bitter political rivalries.

title: Dipika Kakar Health Update: Actress recovers after liver cyst procedure
content: Actress Dipika Kakar is facing a new health challenge with a 1.3 cm liver cyst, following her liver cancer treatment last year. Husband Shoaib Ibrahim confirmed her procedure went well and she is recovering, though experiencing some pain. Doctors are considering immunotherapy for the cyst, with regular check-ups emphasized.

title: Drugged & assaulted: How 2 sisters ran a rape-conversion racket in Bhopal
content: Police have registered two FIRs for rape and forced religious conversion against a gang in Bhopal. Two women, one from Chhattisgarh and another from Bhopal, were allegedly lured with job offers, then sexually exploited and pressured to convert. Three individuals, including the alleged mastermind Razia, have been arrested as investigations continue.

title: Will India venue ticket holders get refunds if Pakistan reach T20 World Cup semis and final?
content: Tickets for the T20 World Cup semi-finals and final went on sale, but venues may change depending on Pakistan and Sri Lanka‚Äôs qualification. If Pakistan reach the semis or final, matches will shift to Colombo, with refunds for Kolkata and Ahmedabad ticket holders. Sri Lanka‚Äôs scenario could also move the first semi-final to Colombo. Fans will get refunds if their venue doesn‚Äôt host the match.

title: Payton says OC Webb to call Broncos' offense

content: The director of the Louvre Museum, who had been under fire since the stunning and embarrassing heist of the French Crown jewels in October, has stepped down from the position, French President Emmanuel Macron's office said Tuesday.

title: In Pics: Zelensky Aged Visibly By War's Toll, Putin Frozen Exactly Since 2022
content: The contrast between Volodymyr Zelensky and Vladimir Putin is one of the most defining visual stories of the war itself.

title: Sikh Man Kidnapped In Daylight, Killed In California Mistaken-Identity Case
content: A 57-year-old Sikh man of Indian origin was kidnapped and murdered in California in a horrific case of mistaken identity on Tuesday. Avtar Singh was abducted in broad daylight from Tracy, which is an hour from San Jose.

title: Shots Fired At Bishnoi Gang Lawyer's Vehicle By Men On Bike In Delhi
content: A car carrying a lawyer who is part of gangster Lawrence Bishnoi's legal team, was shot at in Delhi on Tuesday. Besides the lawyer, there were four others in the car, which wastargetted near the Delhi's Kashmere Gate inter-state bus stand.

title: After El Mencho's Death, Cartels Turn To Fake News To Spread Fear In Mexico
content: After Mexican forces killed the country's most wanted cartel leader on Sunday, false accounts of spectacular violence swept across social media, fueled by what researchers say was a coordinated propaganda campaign by organised crime.

title: Centre Approves 5,000 Houses In Manipur For People Displaced By Ethnic Violence
content: The construction of 5,000 houses were approved for the rehabilitation of internally displaced persons (IDPs) in Manipur under the Pradhan Mantri Awass Yojna-Gramin (PMAY-G).

title: Iran To Buy Chinese Supersonic Anti-Ship Missiles Amid US Tensions: Report
content: Iran is close to a deal with China to purchase anti-ship cruise missiles, according to reports, just as the United States deploys a vast naval force near the Iranian coast ahead of possible strikes.

title: After Petition Flags AI Misuse, High Court Issues Notices To Centre
content: The Gujarat High Court on Tuesday issued notices to the Central and state governments on a PIL concerning the misuse of artificial intelligence to create deepfakes and synthetically generated content targeting Constitutional authorities.

title: "Papa, I Was...": Rented Thar Rams i20, Kills Bhopal Tourist In Goa
content: A 65-year-old tourist from Bhopal died after a rented Mahindra Thar SUV collided with the rear of the family's hatchback at the Happy Bar junction in North Goa's Assagao. The incident occurred on Monday, police said.

title: The Dilemma Over Bengal Name Change As Kerala Becomes Keralam
content: The Centre's move to rename Kerala has had ripples in distant West Bengal, where Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee accused the government of being anti-Bengal.

title: "As Soon As There's More Clarity": Piyush Goyal On India-US Trade Talk
content: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal on Tuesday said "as soon as" there is more clarity in the situation at the tariffs front in the US, India will resume trade talks.

title: 'Love, Not Lust': Court Dismisses POCSO Case Against Man Who Married Victim
content: The Uttarakhand High Court has quashed proceedings in a POCSO case against a man, noting that the accused and the victim are now legally married, have a child and that the woman wants to live with him.

title: On Camera, Elderly Man Flung Into Air After High-Speed Collision In UP
content: One person died, and another was injured after a speeding car lost control and rammed a bystander in Uttar Pradesh's Basti. The incident was captured on camera and witnessed by the victim's family, who were present at the scene.

title: How A Pakistani Judge With Fake Law Degree Served The High Court For 5 Years
content: A judge from Pakistan served in the Islamabad High Court (IHC), delivering judgements without anyone discovering that he held a fake law degree.

title: Poll Body, State Panels Adopt National Declaration For Unified Voter Rolls
content: The National Round Table Conference of the Election Commission of India and State Election Commissioners concluded in New Delhi with the adoption of the National Declaration 2026.

title: A Month After Crash Killed Ajit Pawar, 4 VSR Aviation Aircraft Grounded
content: The civil aviation regulator has ordered the grounding of four aircraft operated by VSR Ventures Pvt Ltd, a non-scheduled aircraft operator, following a special safety audit conducted after the Learjet 45 crash in Maharashtra's Baramati.

title: "Signing Off": 22-Year-Old Andhra Engineering Student's Suicide In Hostel
content: A 22-year-old engineering student died by suicide in a private hostel in Andhra Pradesh's Tirupati on Tuesday.

title: Ever noticed ‚Äòheight above sea level‚Äô boards at railway stations? Here‚Äôs what it means

title: Texans GM: Stroud trade speculation is 'moronic'
content: texans general manager calls trade talk about quarterback "moronic" "he's going to be playing quarterback for the Houston Texans in 2026," caserio says . the 2023 no. 2 draft pick just completed his third season . he sat out three games because of a concussion .

title: Kings of the hot corner: Buster Olney ranks baseball's best third basemen
content: we rank the best of the best at third base . we will roll out a position per day over the next two weeks . the goal of this exercise is to identify the best players for the 2026 season, not who might be best in five years or over their career.

title: Hooked on hockey after the Olympics? An updated look at the NHL's playoff picture
content: the NHL paused its season to allow its players to compete in the 2026 winter Olympics in Italy . around 143 players saw action in the Olympic men's hockey tournament . some return as bitter runners-ups, others as new minted gold medalists .

title: USA Basketball's road to 2028: New era, new coach, new decisions
content: in 2024, a team USA squad full of stars, role players, up-and-comers and legends survived two thrillers . a 95-91 win over Nikola Jokic -led Serbia squad and an exhausting 98-87 clincher over host France . it doesn't appear that USA Basketball's graybearded Avengers will reassemble to chase a sixth consecutive gold .

title: Top 25 rankings, play of the week and what to watch
content: the Razorbacks beat the Musketeers 7-6 in a road series against Tennessee . the Vols dropped seven spots to no. 20 in this week's rankings . they're facing the top team in the country in UCLA on Friday .

title: Trade grades: What can Brett Kulak do for the Avalanche?
content: the 2025-26 NHL trade season continues now that the Olympics and the Olympic roster freeze are over . the Vancouver Canucks traded defenseman Rasmus Andersson to the Vegas Golden Knights in exchange for a package that included defenseman Zach Whitecloud .

title: Week 3 Top 25 and how to watch
content: Sophia Knight was named SEC Player of the Week after going 11-for-13 last week . she has recorded eight multi-hit games and is hitting .543 through the first 14 games of the season . here is the complete scoreboard here to stay up to date this spring .

title: No one loves late drama like Liverpool. What's behind their taste for theatrics?
content: arsenal beat Nottingham Forest 1-0 in the premier league on sunday afternoon . the win is the latest dramatic installment in a campaign characterized by last-gasp winners . it is a quirk that has inflicted both joy and misery on head coach arne slot's side .
